SPELL_BETTER.limitActionsToCantripsHint: Instead of showing all spells that deal damage in the Actions area, limit it to only cantrips.
SPELL_BETTER.showIconsOnInventoryListHin: Add the icons to the items on the inventory list.
SPELL_BETTER.expandedLimitedHint: Show the full character sheet for users who have the Limited permission for a given Actor.
SPELL_BETTER.HideCategoryWithNoSpells.HI: Hide standard categories with no spells; custom categories are always shown.
SPELL_BETTER.SubstituteForSpellbook.NAME: Substitute for Spellbook
SPELL_BETTER.SubstituteForSpellbook.HINT: On supported Character Sheets, when you click on the Spellbook tab, Spell Better will open instead of the sheet Spellbook
SPELL_BETTER.SpellFilters: Spell Filters (applied to all visible spells)
SPELL_BETTER.NewCategory.TITLE: Add Custom View or Spellbook
SPELL_BETTER.NewCategory.NAME: Name
SPELL_BETTER.NewCategory.Filter.LABEL: Filter
SPELL_BETTER.NewCategory.Filter.HINT: Pick one filter (like the ones in the Spellbook header) to define your category
SPELL_BETTER.NewCategory.Type.NAME: Category Type
SPELL_BETTER.NewCategory.Type.HINT:
View: Drag spells from your standard spellbook to create a custom view (for example, Utility). They will still show in other views and filters.
Filter: Filter spells from your standard spellbook (for example, Rituals or One Round)
Spellbook: Create a custom spellbook (for example, From dead mage). Spells you create or drag here will not show anywhere else except All
